body_text:
We'd like to add a basic dashboard for show-heartbeat recipes that displays the following metrics from Telemetry:

Total count of users who have seen the prompt
Total count of users who have voted / engaged with the prompt
Conversion rate (seen vs engaged)
Distribution of star rating votes

The dashboard should allow admins to select a date range over which the results should be computed.
body_html:
We'd like to add a basic dashboard for show-heartbeat recipes that displays the following metrics from Telemetry:

  • Total count of users who have seen the prompt
  • Total count of users who have voted / engaged with the prompt
  • Conversion rate (seen vs engaged)
  • Distribution of star rating votes

The dashboard should allow admins to select a date range over which the results should be computed.
title: Dashboards of Telemetry analysis
body:
We'd like to add a basic dashboard for `show-heartbeat` recipes that displays the following metrics from Telemetry:

- Total count of users who have seen the prompt
- Total count of users who have voted / engaged with the prompt
- Conversion rate (seen vs engaged)
- Distribution of star rating votes

The dashboard should allow admins to select a date range over which the results should be computed.
